page.title: 08High Littleton School.
page.content: { High Littleton School}has 140 children aged from 4 to 11 in 5 classes.The children come from{High {Littleton,Hallatrow & Amesbury.}The number in school is expected to rise in the next 5 years & is already at maximum.The school was built as an all age school around 1842.There is a small playground and we use the village recreation field for games. There are many after-school activities and most subjects are taught.Many parents come in to help.The school uniform is light blue & dark blue. School dinners are bought from the Central Kitchens at Timsbury and half the children bring sandwiches.The school has just been decorated inside & out with lowered ceilings and new boilers.We have 2 pairs of gerbils and a hamster as pets.
